item.description:
Ginza in Chinatown has amazing sushi (and other dishes if you don't like it, try the eel!). Afterwards, we'll take one of the walking tours around Boston, to be announced. A little touristy, I know, but should still be fun. If it looks like the weather's going to be bad that day, a new activity will be posted asap.

*UPDATE* All the guided tours I checked either start in May or are extremely expensive. So here's what we're going to do: take a free Mp3 audio tour! Go to http://www.bostonharb... and download the Mp3 to your iPod or Mp3 player of choice. If you don't have one, that's okay, we'll fill you in. I get the feeling we'll mostly be chatting with each other anyways, and we can go at our own pace. We'll start whenever we can walk after filling up on sushi.

(I shamelessly stole the idea from another meetup... but at least it's a different tour!)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Sushi and a Tour
